channel.title: [Help]Changing the Prayer drain rate
channel.description:
When i have prayer on, it drains way to fast, as long as someone gives me the peice of code where i am to change the time intervals between each decrease in prayer, i can do it easily. I have tried searching drain, and it comes up with non relevant ideas.
Im not sure if i need to even add a completely new prayer system into the server, but im pretty sure it only requires a specific change in seconds.
Appreciate the help.
-v0x
